typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(new = StandardCost/ListPrice) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['dervied'],
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDate,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate,
		new
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		middlename as string,
		sex as string,
		ID as string,
		lastname as string,
		regno as string,
		firstname as string,
		dob as string,
		phone as string,
		email as string,
		nextofkin as string,
		nextofkinaddress as string,
		address as string,
		facultyid as string,
		deptid as string,
		password as string,
		currentlevel as string,
		nextofkinphone as string,
		status as string,
		pob as string,
		entry as string,
		stateid as string,
		lga as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		regno as string,
		firstname as string,
		lastname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		regno,
		firstname,
		lastname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		{_c0} as string,
		{ID         } as string,
		{transactiondate                                                                                     } as string,
		{transactiontype                                                                                     } as string,
		{transactionitem                                                                                     } as string,
		transactionamount as string,
		{transactionsession                                                                                  } as string,
		transactionitemid as string,
		{regno                                                                                               } as string,
		{programid  } as string,
		{programlevel                                                                                        } as string,
		{SCHOOLID   } as string,
		{transactionsemester                                                                                 } as string,
		{xprint                                                                                              } as string,
		{campus                                                                                              } as string,
		{_c15} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		regno as string,
		firstname as string,
		lastname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join({regno                                                                                               } == regno,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(input(
		regno as string,
		transactionsession as string,
		transactionsemester as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		regno
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		product_id as string,
		qty as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		id as integer,
		product_id as string,
		product as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 lookup(source1@product_id == source2@product_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(input(
		dim_product_key as integer,
		qty as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		dim_product_key = id,
		qty
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
